overview: Hair metal heroes Poison show off the hot-rodded guitar riffs and outrageous look that made them among hard rock's biggest stars in this collection of music videos. Video Hits: Poison features the original promo clips for the songs "Cry Tough," "I Want Action," "Nothin' But A Good Time," "Fallen Angel," "Every Rose Has Its Thorn," and "Unskinny Bop." ~ Mark Deming, Rovi All Movie Guide
title: Poison: Video Hits
